news.text: Paper submission "StickySchedule: An Interactive Multi-user Application for Conference Scheduling on Large-scale Shared Displays" was accepted at %%PerDis%% (ACM International Symposium on Pervasive Displays).
Paper titled "Mixed Presence Collaboration using Scalable Visualizations in Heterogeneous Display Spaces" was presented at %%CSCW 2017%% (Computer-Supported Cooperative Work & Social Computing).

Paper submission titled "Automated Dynamic Data Redistribution" was accepted at %%PDSEC 2017%% (Parallel and Distributed Scientific and Engineering Computing). PDSEC is a workshop held in conjunction with IPDPS (International Parallel & Distributed Processing Symposium).

I accepted a new position of Assistant Professor in the %%Computer and Information Sciences Department at the University of St. Thomas%% in St. Paul, MN. I am set to begin for the 2017-2018 academic year!

Extended Abstract papers "Interactive Multi-Modal Display Spaces for Visual Analysis" and "Synchronized Mixed Presence Data-Conferencing Using Large-Scale Shared Displays" were presented during the poster session at %%ISS 2016%% (Interactive Surfaces and Spaces).
I helped develop curriculum and teach at the %%ANL Summer Coding Camp%%, where 26 high school students learned to program Python during a one week bootcamp.
